persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 36-year-old full-time crypto trader, expertly navigates the volatile digital currency markets with a keen eye for detail and a fearless approach to risk. Known for their cooperative spirit, Ellis thrives in collaborative environments, often sharing insights and strategies with fellow traders to stay ahead of market trends. Their expert-level experience is characterized by a strategic blend of bold, calculated moves and meticulous analysis, making them a formidable presence in the crypto trading world.
